Sponsorship Opportunities Available

Today this web site is sponsored by Brad Templeton, the creator of the rec.humor.funny newsgroup. It's a popular site, generating millions of page views per month. Non-banner sponsorship generated thousands of click-throughs each month for the previous sponsor. Both banner and text-link sponsorships are available.

Note that he is staring a new company. Job opportunities are here

In the meantime, please join us in giving your support to the Electronic Frontier Foundation the first and foremost organization protecting civil rights, freedom of expression, privacy and cryptography in the digital age.

You should read my letter about why you should join the EFF.

If your firm is interested in sponsorship of this web site, contact Brad Templeton.

We are currently featuring Google Adsense advertising on many of the joke pages.
